channel.title: CVE Feed for Bender / ebee -- CC612
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Bender / ebee -- CC612

item.title: CVE-2021-34601|2024-09-16T19:47:12.796Z -- bender%20%2F%20ebee -- cc612
item.description: In Bender/ebee Charge Controllers in multiple versions are prone to Hardcoded Credentials. Bender charge controller CC612 in version 5.20.1 and below is prone to hardcoded ssh credentials. An attacker may use the password to gain administrative access to the web-UI.
